fields.value: WorldPop Archive global gridded spatial datasets. Version Alpha 0.9. 100m base slope (tiled)

dsDescriptionValue.value: Slope DEM provided as 1201x1201 pixel tiles, based on GADM v2.0 country boundaries (http://www.gadm.org/) with some island ccid, internal country boundary, and enclave amendments from gpwv4 (http://www.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/gpw-v4) and GADM v2.8, and Viewfinder Panorama SRTM based 3" topography tiles (http://viewfinderpanoramas.org/).

publicationCitation.value: Lloyd C. T., Sorichetta A., Tatem A. J. High Resolution Global Gridded Data for use in population studies. Sci. Data. Pending (2016).

value: de Ferranti, J. Digital Elevation Data. Viewfinder Panoramas http://www.viewfinderPanoramas.org/dem3.html (2015).
Global ADMinistrative Areas (GADM). Download. Global Administrative Areas  http://gadm.org/country (2015).
Grid cell having a resolution of 3 arc-second (0.00083333333 DD)

files.description: Slope DEM provided as 1201x1201 pixel tiles, based on GADM v2.0 country boundaries (http://www.gadm.org/) with some island ccid, internal country boundary, and enclave amendments from gpwv4 (http://www.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/gpw-v4) and GADM v2.8, and Viewfinder Panorama SRTM based 3" topography tiles (http://viewfinderpanoramas.org/).
